## Changes made (Choose one or multiple)
- [ ] `fix` non-breaking change which fixes an issue
- [ ] `feat` non-breaking change which adds functionality
- [ ] `refactor`: code optimization with no logical changes
- [ ] `assets` or `ui`: changes to sprites, sounds, or screens
- [ ] `chore`: build scripts, CI, dependencies
- [ ] `perf`: tangible performance improvements
- [ ] `docs`: update documentation
- [ ] `test`: add unit, integration tests etc.
    - [ ] Unit Tests: I ran `./gradlew test` and all tests passed. (optional but raccomanded)
    - [ ] Manual Test: I verified in-game that... (optional)
    - [ ] New Tests: I added tests for the new logic (e.g., in `CombatTest` or `MovementTest`).
